linkedInProfile.userDescription: Creative Marketing Coordinator at The Copyrights Group (STUDIOCANAL UK)
linkedInProfile.aboutDescripton: First-Class Graduate in BSc International Management and Modern Languages (French) from the University of Bath. I am currently a Creative Marketing Coordinator at The Copyrights Group, part of STUDIOCANAL, and work primarily with the Paddington BearTM brand. Previous brands worked with include Jurassic World, Minions, Trolls, & Gabby’s Dollhouse. Experienced in Franchise/Brand marketing in entertainment and licensing.Skills: - Influencer Management Platforms (TRIBE)- Social Media (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat, LinkedIn)- Social Media Management (Hootsuite, Meta Business Suite)- Email Marketing (Mailchimp, MailerLite)- Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel) - Content creation (Canva, Adobe Photoshop)- Asset Management (Mediabox)- Marketing Approvals (Mediabox)- Languages (English Native, French Professional, Basic Spanish)- HTML coding
